action.name: Fearsome Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 11}, one creature the scarecrow can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. While {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition.
